thread.title: The U.S. Speedskating Jinx Continues in Pyeongchang

author: Joshua Robinson
title: The U.S. Speedskating Jinx Continues in Pyeongchang
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—The American speedskating medal drought was supposed to end on Monday night.
The issue that skaters blamed for their shutout in Sochi four years ago—allegedly defective Under Armour suits—had been solved. The lessons had been learned. And now the U.S. had Heather Bergsma heading into the 1,500 meters as the 2017 world champion over that distance.
It... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
